title: Documentation
subtitle: Everything you need to master Alphalens and maximize your trading insights

quickStart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickStart.step1Description: Sign up with your email and start with a free trial to explore all features.
quickStart.step2Description: Choose your trading broker from our supported list to get tailored insights.
quickStart.step3Description: Use AI Trade Setup, Macro Commentary, and Reports to generate trading insights.
quickStart.step4Description: Add positions and receive AI-powered recommendations for optimization.

credits.title: Understanding Credits
credits.description: Alphalens uses a credit-based system for AI-generated insights:
credits.tradeSetup: Trade Setup: 1 credit per AI-generated trade idea
credits.macroCommentary: Macro Commentary: 1 credit per market analysis
credits.resetInfo: Credits reset monthly based on your subscription plan. Unused credits do not roll over.

aiSetup.title: AI Trade Setup
aiSetup.description: Generate intelligent trade ideas with entry points, stop losses, and take profit levels.

macroCommentary.title: Macro Commentary
macroCommentary.description: AI-powered analysis of macroeconomic trends and market sentiment.

reports.title: Comprehensive Reports
reports.description: Generate detailed research reports on any asset or market.

aiSetup.title: Configuring AI Trade Setup
aiSetup.step1Description: Search for stocks, forex pairs, cryptocurrencies, or commodities using the search bar.
aiSetup.step2Description: Select from 1m, 5m, 15m, 1h, 4h, 1D, or 1W timeframes based on your trading style.
aiSetup.step3Description: Adjust risk tolerance, position size, and analysis depth to match your strategy.
aiSetup.step4Description: Click "Generate AI Setup" and receive your personalized trade idea within seconds.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Management
portfolio.description: Build and manage your investment portfolio with AI-powered insights.
portfolio.feature1: Add positions with entry price and quantity

api.title: API Access
api.description: Enterprise and Professional plans include API access for integration with your own systems.
api.contact: For API documentation and access credentials, please contact our team at

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How accurate are the AI predictions?
faq.answer1: Our AI analyzes multiple data sources and technical indicators, but trading involves risk. Always use our insights as one input in your decision-making process.
faq.question2: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.answer2: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. You'll retain access until the end of your billing period.
faq.answer3: We support forex, cryptocurrencies, and commodities. Coverage is continuously expanding.
faq.answer4: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security practices. We never sell your data to third parties.
